Are you Looking for an enterprise grade cloud hosting solution? Look no further.

Our cloud system gives you the option of installing from your own ISO image or net installer. All resources are dedicated to your server. Host any application "in the cloud" and say goodbye to that server in your office. For all windows licensing costs, please email, sales [@] w4networks.com.

CLD 1:

1 CPU Core 20GB HDD Space 1GB Dedicated Ram 1.5TB Bandwidth 1 IP

$6 per month $0 Setup http://www.w4networks.com/services/vps-servers

Servers located in GoRack DC - Jacksonville Florida
